mapper.update: UPDATE product_qna SET isAnswered = 'Y' WHERE idx = #{parent_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product_qna q INNER JOIN member_info m ON q.member_idx = m.member_idx WHERE q.product_idx = #{product_idx} and q.deleted_yn = 'N' and parent_idx is null order by q.idx desc
mapper.delete: UPDATE product_qna SET deleted_yn = 'Y' WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE product p SET p.qna_count = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_qna q WHERE product_idx = #{product_idx}) WHERE idx = #{idx}
